edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.view.preferences.creation

Class PreferencesPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JScrollPane
            • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.view.preferences.creation.PreferencesPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPreferencesPanel, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.ScrollPaneConstants

    public class PreferencesPanel
extends javax.swing.JScrollPane
implements IPreferencesPanel
    used to display user preferences, allowing the user to edit their facebook email, and mobile phone number and select how they wanted to be contacted
    Author:
    Bobby Drop Tables
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
